hypothesis: Joaquin Phoenix earned a Best Actor nomination for portraying Freddie Quell in The Master.
premise: + Joaquin Phoenix + He has subsequently earned Best Actor nominations for portraying musician Johnny Cash in the biopic Walk the Line ( 2005 ) and for his role as Freddie Quell , a sex-obsessed alcoholic World War II veteran in the drama film The Master ( 2012 ) , the latter winning him the Volpi Cup for Best Actor . + The Master (2012 film) + It tells the story of Freddie Quell ( Phoenix ) , a World War II veteran struggling to adjust to a post-war society , who meets Lancaster Dodd ( Hoffman ) , a leader of a religious movement known as `` The Cause '' . + The Master (2012 film) + The Master is a 2012 American psychological drama film written , directed , and co-produced by Paul Thomas Anderson and starring Joaquin Phoenix , Philip Seymour Hoffman , and Amy Adams .
explanation_1: Joaquin Phoenix earned a Best Actor nomination for portraying Freddie Quell in The Master.

hypothesis: Sue Sylvester was in an American musical comedy-drama TV series.
premise: + Glee (TV series) + Glee is an American musical comedy-drama television series that aired on the Fox network in the United States from May 19 , 2009 , to March 20 , 2015 . + Sue Sylvester + Susan `` Sue '' Sylvester is a fictional character of the Fox musical comedy-drama series , Glee . + Sue Sylvester + The character is portrayed by actress Jane Lynch , and has appeared in Glee from its pilot episode , first broadcast on May 19 , 2009 . + Fox Broadcasting Company + The Fox Broadcasting Company ( often shortened to Fox and stylized as FOX ) is an American English language commercial broadcast television network that is owned by the Fox Entertainment Group subsidiary of 21st Century Fox . + Pilot (Glee) + `` Pilot '' is the pilot episode of the American television series Glee , which premiered on the Fox network on May 19 , 2009 .
explanation_1: Sue Sylvester was in the TV series Glee, which is an American musical comedy-drama TV series.

hypothesis: Ben Affleck is in Good Will Hunting.
premise: + Good Will Hunting + Good Will Hunting is a 1997 American drama film , directed by Gus Van Sant , and starring Robin Williams , Matt Damon , Ben Affleck , Minnie Driver and Stellan Skarsgård . + Ben Affleck + His younger brother is actor Casey Affleck , with whom he has worked on several films including Good Will Hunting and Gone Baby Gone . + Ben Affleck + Affleck gained wider recognition when he and childhood friend Matt Damon won the Golden Globe and Academy Award for Best Original Screenplay for Good Will Hunting ( 1997 ) . + Ben Affleck + Benjamin Geza Affleck-Boldt ( born August 15 , 1972 ) is an American actor and filmmaker .
explanation_1: Ben Affleck is an actor in Good Will Hunting.

hypothesis: Pat Riley has avoided being an executive for professional basketball.
premise: + Pat Riley + Patrick James Riley ( born March 20 , 1945 ) is an American professional basketball executive , and a former coach and player in the National Basketball Association ( NBA ) . + Pat Riley + He is the first North American sports figure to win a championship as a player , coach ( both assistant and head ) , and executive . + National Basketball Association + The National Basketball Association ( NBA ) is the major men 's professional basketball league in North America , and is widely considered to be the premier men 's professional basketball league in the world .

hypothesis: Conan O'Brien only performs in New York City.
premise: + Saturday Night Live + Saturday Night Live ( abbreviated as SNL ) is an American late-night live television sketch comedy and variety show created by Lorne Michaels and developed by Dick Ebersol . + The Tonight Show with Conan O'Brien + The Tonight Show with Conan O'Brien was an American late-night talk show that featured Conan O'Brien as host from June 1 , 2009 , to January 22 , 2010 , as part of NBC 's long-running Tonight Show franchise . + Conan O'Brien + Afterwards , O'Brien relocated from New York to Los Angeles to host his own incarnation of The Tonight Show for seven months until network politics prompted a host change in 2010 . + Conan O'Brien + He has hosted Conan since 2010 and has also hosted such events as the Emmy Awards and Christmas in Washington . + Conan O'Brien + O'Brien has been the subject of a documentary , Conan O'Brien Ca n't Stop ( 2011 ) , and has also hosted a 32-city live comedy tour .
explanation_1: Conan O'Brien performs in New York City, Los Angeles and other cities.
